title: VA Albums Collection: Ska-Revival, 2-Tone, Ska-Punk (18 albums)
description:
VA Albums Collection: Ska-Revival, 2-Tone, Ska-Punk (18 albums, 21 CDs)

Not my rips. From RuTracker and elsewhere.
File and folder names have been harmonized. Extraneous files were deleted. Full meta tags and embedded art.
AllMusic reviews added where available.

VA - A Tribute To Madness (1998)
VA - Dance Craze, The Best Of British Ska... Live! (1981) [1990]
VA - Forever Free, A Sublime Tribute Album (2006)

VA - SKA, The Second Wave (1998)
VA - Ska Beats, 18 Ska Classics! (1996)
VA - Ska Heroes, 18 Ska Classics! (1996)
VA - Ska Is Dead (2007)

VA - Ska Riffs, 18 Ska Classics! (1996)
VA - Take Warning, The Songs Of Operation Ivy (1997)
VA - The Compact 2 Tone Story (1993) (4 CDs)
VA - The Sound Of Ska, 16 Hits From The Beat, Selector & Bad Manners (1998)
VA - The Specials, Selector, Special Beat, The Best Of Ska, Live (1995)
